titles.title: A resolution commemorating the success of Team USA in the past 25 Olympic Games and supporting Team USA in the 2012 Olympic and Paralympic Games.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 7/26/2012--Introduced. Expresses support for: (1) the athletes of Team USA at the 2012 Olympic and Paralympic Games in London, England; and (2) the goals and ideals of the Olympic Games. Applauds all of the athletes and coaches of Team USA and their families. Thanks the U.S. Olympic Committee for its unwavering support of Team USA.
